name: Spencer Ng
text: My dog’s food looks more appealing than what they offer here. Sure, they’re generous with the portions, but at what cost to you? Every dish sitting in the buffet-style warmers looks unexciting and has excessive grease to it. There’s some foods sitting in crockpots on the countertop for crying out loud. My wife and I both got FOOD POISONING. Although the owner and company are very kind, aesthetics and food safety are obviously not a concern here. Look for your next meal elsewhere.

name: Yesi D
text: The best thai food around town

name: jesus davila
text: Love this place ❤ food is amazing 👏😋

name: Adrian Miller
text: VERY Good but a very small selection to choose from and food runs out fast at the buffet when it's crowded. Had to wait a few times to get the dish I liked... Can't really beat the price.

name: carilu duran
text: The Food is amazing

name: Matt Smith
text: If you like authentic Thai food than Toi's is were you want to go!  The food is always fresh and extremely flavorful.  The spring rolls are made fresh every morning and are second to none.  I use to eat at this place 2-3 times a week for lunch.  Whenever I am in the Wiregrass, I always try to eat lunch at Toi's.  Stop in and give it a try, you'll be glad you did!!

name: Madison Stewart
text: Went for an early lunch around 11 & the food was right off the grill- very fresh & delicious! You can’t beat the value for $7.50. Definitely the place to go for lunch in Daleville! :)

name: steve lisenby
text: Loved it food is great!!

name: GB Fertig
text: Food was good, though would have like a larger selection of curries on buffet.

name: Christy Powell
text: Absolutely my most favorite place to eat. They have the best spring rolls on the planet. Let them sit in & soak up the sweet dipping sauce for a couple of minutes & you will be hooked for life. I’m not sure how anyone could leave hungry. Not to mention miss Toi is so sweet and always making sure you have plenty.

name: Brandon Cassady
text: Maybe I'm picky when it comes to Thai food but I was very underwhelmed. It wasnt terrible though.

name: Lee McCray
text: Absolutely the best Thai food hands down

name: Christopher P
text: Very consistent buffet.  This buffet has had the same offering for years.  It's good and consistent.  The service is always excellent.  It's a lunch buffet only resturant.  One of my favorites in the area.  Seems to be very authentic Thai food.

name: Tim Clubb
text: Good price for a buffet.  Not a lot of selection but the price is decent.

name: Gage Lewis
text: The food is delicious and toi is a very sweet and kind person. The spring rolls are amazing!

name: Shamus Ivette Kirschbaum
text: They have a buffet that they bring out I small portions which ensures the food is fresh.  The owners provide personal service. Consistent and dependable for 13 years.

name: Ashley Lane
text: Good food, but air conditioner had not been working properly the past few visits and that makes the dining experience uncomfortable. Food is really good though!

name: John Meadows
text:
Good price, good food.
We don't typically do buffets but this one was good. The food could be a little hotter but all in all the service and food was well above average for the area.

name: Shamus Ivette Kirschbaum
text: They have a buffet that they bring out I small portions which ensures the food is fresh.  The owners provide personal service. Consistent and dependable for 13 years.

name: Aryn Tew
text: Great lunch buffet especailly for the price. Employees were really nice bathrooms,were clean.

name: christopher johnson
text: This place was terrible. Trust me, we came in for lunch with 8 people and wanted to order from the menu and they said it would take 45mins for it to come out and the buffet was not that great either.

name: Mark Ivey
text: Good food at a good price.

name: CARLOS VICENS
text: Buffet is so good. The only Thai restaurant Ive been to that serves unlimited thai tea. Always visit when in the area.

name: Edward Adams
text: Very dependable and reliable. The food is easily above average, and the sticky rice is perfect. You can get in and out in no time.

name: James Burch
text: We Love this place! Great for lunch and authentic Tai food. Service is very personal and always great!

name: Ed Lawrence
text: I've been eating here for years. The food and flavor are very consistent. Love the soup on Wednesday!

name: lee fry
text: Always fresh! Always tasty! Hasn't been beat for best thai in Daleville! Ever!

name: Rona Ayala
text: Worst Thai food I've ever had. The food smell spoiled, especially the ones cook in coconut milk. The food actually didn't even taste like Thai & buffet doesnt come with dessert. I have no clue why people come here to eat. I gather it's the location. Or they just don't know what good Thai food taste like. Have mercy what a waste of $10.00. Please don't waste your money in this establishment.

name: Bryan Nagle
text: I have loved eating here for many years! Always one of the first places I eat when I get back to Fort Rucker!! Authentic Thai recipes, some spicy some mild, and a great dessert!! Toi is an absolute sweetheart too!

name: Joseph Carlos
text: Awesome food and great service.  Its delicious I recommend to all for authentic Thai Food.

name: Patrick Danford
text: Great Thai buffet. Friendly people. Dana & Toi always greet you with a smile.

name: Linda Fedrick
text: Clean, Taste Great, Buffet and Great Price!

name: Joshua Brigman
text: Had a rock in my food. Taste great but seriously though!!! A rock???

name: Wayne Jenkins
text: I love the food here every time I get to come up for lunch. The owners make you feel as though you are with family and friends.

name: Sadie Daffer
text: The main guy convinced to to eat the lunch buffet because it would take 45 minutes to get our food if we ordered off the menu. The buffet was disgusting and all the food was dry. Will never eat there again.

name: Christopher Braund
text: Great place for lunch just outside Fort Rucker's Daleville gate.  Sadly, I eat too much every time I go in.

name: Joshua Bane
text: Hot and humid. Small buffet. Luke warm food. Way too pricy for what you get. Left hungry still.

name: Jostlyn Bomhard
text: best thai food I have ever had! Toi is amazing!

name: Jostlyn Bomhard
text: best thai food I have ever had! Toi is amazing!

name: crfrider57
text: Excellent food and service

name: Patrick Ingraham
text: Wife loves the cabbage

name: Steven S
text: The best Thai restaurant ever!

name: Julio Caban
text: Best restaurant in Daleville.

name: Zack F
text: We've tried to go here several times, but they've posted the wrong opening hours.

name: Jacob Nelson
text: Boring

name: steven wilson
text: The food & the owners!

name: James Brown
text: Always a fantastic buffet!

name: Todd Bowden
text: Excellent lunch buffet

name: JD InDaleville
text: Sweet Pork, excellent.

name: Tyler Bonts
text: Not the best Thai in Daleville.
